resources

Class Transfer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Object>
      • resources.Transfer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Integer>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Integer>

    public class Transfer
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Object>
    Class that implements the transfer of archive file to user's DropBox account. Class implements javax.swing.SwingWorker Class - An abstract class to perform lengthy GUI-interacting tasks in a dedicated thread.
    Author:
    Alex

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javax.swing.SwingWorker

    • Method Detail

      • doInBackground

        protected java.lang.Integer doInBackground()
        Function that connects and transfers an archive to user's DropBox account.
        Specified by:
        doInBackground in class javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Object>
        Returns:
        "0" - if transfer was successful or "1" - otherwise.

      • done

        protected void done()
        Function that executes when doInBackground function finished it's execution. if file was transferred successfully than function deletes archive backup file that was saved on users hard drive. if not, function shows appropriate error message and leaves backup archive. At the end function closes transfer window.
        Overrides:
        done in class javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Object>
